DL_ImageGen_bench.apputils.Deblur_apputils package¶

Submodules¶

DL_ImageGen_bench.apputils.Deblur_apputils.get_data module¶

class DL_ImageGen_bench.apputils.Deblur_apputils.get_data.GetData(technique='cyclegan', verbose=True)[源代码]¶

基类：object

Download CycleGAN or Pix2Pix Data.

Args:
technique : str
One of: ‘cyclegan’ or ‘pix2pix’.中文显示
verbose : bool
If True, print additional information.
Examples:
>>> from util.get_data import GetData
>>> gd = GetData(technique='cyclegan')
>>> new_data_path = gd.get(save_path='./datasets')  # options will be displayed.
get(save_path, dataset=None)[源代码]¶

Download a dataset.

Args:
save_path : str
A directory to save the data to.
dataset : str, optional
A specific dataset to download. Note: this must include the file extension. If None, options will be presented for you to choose from.
Returns:
save_path_full : str
The absolute path to the downloaded data.
